guide.getStarted: Press the button to get started.

hero.title: Meet JeongAmSu
hero.subtitle: Your Friendly AI Assistant
hero.description: JeongAmSu is a friendly AI chatbot developed by the Department of Information Security and Cryptographic Mathematics, designed to help students with questions about the department, classes, schedules, campus information, and administrative procedures.

mission.title: Our Mission
mission.content: Our goal is to help students receive quick and accurate answers to everyday questions about campus services, events, and administrative procedures, making campus life more convenient.

language-support.title: Language Support
language-support.content: JeongAmSu supports multiple languages. Select your preferred language below.

item-1.title: Campus Navigation
item-1.description: Provides information on building locations, office hours, and campus facilities.

item-2.title: Administrative Support
item-2.description: Offers guidance on course registration, document submission, and administrative procedures.

item-3.title: Event Information
item-3.description: Informs you about school events, club activities, and important schedules.

item-4.title: FAQ Helper
item-4.description: Answers frequently asked questions about school policies and procedures.

item-5.title: Resource Finder
item-5.description: Helps you easily find the departments, services, or contacts you need.

impact.title: Impact on the School
impact.content: Since introducing JeongAmSu, students' wait times for information searches have decreased, and 24-hour responses to questions have become possible, making campus life much more convenient.

development.title: Continuous Development
development.content: JeongAmSu continuously learns through interactions with students, expanding its knowledge of school resources and improving features to meet the changing needs of students.

contact.title: Using JeongAmSu
contact.content: You can use JeongAmSu through your web browser or download JeongAmSu to your device to use it anytime.

page.title: Contact
page.description: Need help? You can reach us in the following ways

consultation.title: Student Consultation Hours
consultation.note: * Advance reservation and scheduling required during consultation hours *

administrative.title: Administrative Office
administrative.note: General inquiries, document issuance, administrative support

student.title: Student Support
student.note: Course registration, academic counseling, student support

report.title: Found an issue?
report.description: Let us know about technical problems or suggestions for improvement
